title: "Octane AI Honored by Quartz as One of the 2021 Best Companies for Remote Workers"
excerpt: "Octane AI, the pioneer zero-party data marketing platform, was announced yesterday as one of the honorees on Quartz's first-ever global ranking of the Best Companies for Remote Workers. The program honors 54 companies providing outstanding benefits and work culture for remote employees around the world and across various industries."
